metadataAttributes.Title: Engineering Project Management: Risk, Quality, Teams, and Procurement
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Many Project Managers focus only on the scope, schedule and budget.  However, a successful project requires that you manage risk, control the quality of the deliverables, engage and manage people and procure goods and services. This course will focus on these key support functions that make the difference between a highly successful project and an average one.  During the course, you will prepare a Qualitative Risk Analysis and Evaluate the Cost of Quality for a provided Case Study.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Project Management,Procurement,Risk Management Plan,Project Risk Management,
